Ghana is now on a run of six AFCON games without a win.
Egypt faces an anxious wait over an injury concern for Mohamed Salah.
Both Egypt and Ghana need to win their final group games to qualify for the round of 16.
Egypt boss Vitoria gave an update after Salah was forced off during the draw with Ghana.

Jurgen Klopp and Rui Vitoria will be hoping Mohamed Salah's injury is not serious as Egypt needs their talisman for the last group game, and Liverpool cannot afford to lose their star player for a prolonged period.
